post:
Tech-Hosts has been offering web hosting services since 2007. We offer a wide range of web hosting services from shared hosting, reseller hosting, master reseller hosting, OpenVZ VPS, Cloud VPS & Dedicated Servers. We are a UK based, VAT registered business with a history that you can trust.

We offer a 30 day money-back guarantee if you are not 100% satisfied with our service.
All our VPS nodes have dual Xeon processors, 64GB+ DDR4 ECC RAM & SAS disks in RAID10 and offsite backups.

We offer 24/7 UK based email support and telephone support during UK office hours

Our plans start from just £3.00 per month.

We accept payment by PayPal, Credit Card, SMS Payments & UK Bank Transfer

Use the following IP for latency tests

149.202.69.145

All our VPS come with the following:
  • Virtualizor Control Panel
  • OpenVZ Virtualization
  • Discounted WHMCS Licenses
  • Instant Setup
  • Gigabit Uplink
  • Weekly Offsite Backups
  • Reverse DNS Available on Request
